name: InboxAI
description: An open-source email domain authentication, real-time deliverability, and email address rectification platform.

funding.description: Funding will support domain auto-authentication (SPF, DKIM, DMARC), real-time deliverability analytics, email rectification using passive bounce signals, and hosting costs.

sustainability.plan: We're building a freemium, API-first email intelligence platform with community support. The open-source core will remain MIT-licensed.
sustainability.maintenance_model: Active team with roadmap releases and GitHub community involvement.

impact.adoption: Over 100+ early beta users with integrations into Mailchimp, SendGrid, and HubSpot.
impact.differentiator: We combine domain authentication, deliverability scoring, and AI-powered email rectification â€” all open-source and developer-first.
